articles.title: The Eagles’ ‘Greatest Hits’ is the first album in US history to sell over 40M units
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Take it easy … and go quadruple diamond. The Eagles’ 1976 album “Their Greatest Hits 1971-1975” the bestselling album of all time in the U.S., has officially sold over 40 million units. articles.title: Oscar nominations are this morning. ‘Sinners’ could make history

articles.title: New water taxi service launches between Miami and Miami Beach
articles.description: MIAMI BEACH, Fla. (AP) — South Florida commuters traveling to or from the beach might be able to save some time and money by getting off the roads and onto the water. articles.title: Woman suffering from cancer says long wait times in B.C. may have contributed to her terminal diagnosis
articles.description: A B.C. mother says that her terminal cancer diagnosis could have been different if she had not to wait two months to see an oncologist.

articles.title: Physicists challenge a 200-year-old law of thermodynamics at the atomic scale
articles.description: A long-standing law of thermodynamics turns out to have a loophole at the smallest scales. Researchers have shown that quantum engines made of correlated particles can exceed the traditional efficiency limit set by Carnot nearly 200 years ago.
